groups.name: friend
groups.membership: SELECT usera AS uid, Album.a_aid AS gid FROM Friend JOIN Album ON (Album.a_uid = Friend.userb) WHERE usera = ? AND Album.public = 0

policies.predicate: SELECT Photo.* FROM Photo JOIN GroupContext ON (Photo.p_aid = GroupContext.id)
policies.description: users can see photos in albums their friends have posted

groups.name: friend_sym
groups.membership: SELECT userb AS uid, Album.a_aid AS gid FROM Friend JOIN Album ON (Album.a_uid = Friend.usera) WHERE userb = ? AND Album.public = 0

policies.predicate: SELECT Photo.* FROM Photo JOIN GroupContext ON (Photo.p_aid = GroupContext.id)
policies.description: users can see photos in albums their friends have posted (for symmetry)

policies.predicate: SELECT Photo.* FROM Photo JOIN Album ON (Photo.p_aid = Album.a_aid) JOIN UserContext ON (UserContext.id = Album.a_uid) WHERE Album.public = 0
